name: Flip World
description:
if you get an error saying "Adobe Flash is required to run this project in the browser," then try this link:
https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/644900

Use bottomless pits to evade hazards! Made for Ludum Dare 30 in under 48 Hours.
Theme: Connected Worlds.

Hint: You can totally get out of the first room ;)

Here's my twitter in case I ever release another game maybe check it :O
https://twitter.com/_AlexanderClay
